articles.title: Google launches its own ‘MagSafe’ with PixelSnap - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is launching its own set of magnetic accessories for Pixel 10 including chargers and stands.
articles.content:
Google announced its own version of “MagSafe” called PixelSnap, which allows magnetic accessories to work with the newly launched Pixel 10 series of devices.

articles.title: Having recovery and/or SSD problems after recent Windows updates? You’re not alone. - Ars Technica

articles.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Devs 'Paying Attention' to Community Feedback on Goofy Skins - IGN
articles.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 developer Treyarch is "paying attention" to community feedback on goofy skins: "We're going to try to calibrate that as we move forward."
articles.content:
Beavis and Butthead. The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. An eyesore of a glowing rainbow unicorn thing.
